Trigger An undead creature within your reach critically fails a Strike against you.

You knock the enemy's blow aside and twist, unbalancing your foe. You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Disarm]{Disarm}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Shove]{Shove}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Trip]{Trip} the triggering creature.

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall
